author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Can you add
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot?

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/OsmanMutlu/BERT.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- feac0950-7c0c-11e9-9e51-41b173ce59c9 -->

body:
- Registering package: BERT
- Repository: https://github.com/OsmanMutlu/BERT.jl
- Created by: @OsmanMutlu
- Version: v0.1.0
- Commit: 95eadd6a4ee6186cea4766d1ab381188d53dc3d7
- Reviewed by: @OsmanMutlu
- Reference: https://github.com/OsmanMutlu/BERT.jl/issues/1#issuecomment-494292667
- Release notes:
<!-- BEGIN RELEASE NOTES -->
> - First version of BERT.jl
> - Pretraining module and finetuning module for sequence classification
> - BertAdam, which is basically a version of Adam that uses weight decay
> - Tokenization is implemented
> - Ability to load weights from pytorch models
> - Provided examples
<!-- END RELEASE NOTES -->

<!--  -->
title: New package: BERT v0.1.0
